gratitude-arrival.title: Gratitude and Arrival
suggestions: Thank Allah for granting you the opportunity to reach His House
Express gratitude for safe travel and good health
Reflect on the immense blessing of standing in this sacred place
Recite abundant Alhamdulillah with a sincere heart

forgiveness.title: Seeking Forgiveness
suggestions: Ask Allah to forgive all your sins, major and minor
Repent from specific sins you remember
Seek forgiveness for your parents, family, and the Muslim Ummah

salawat-prophet.title: Sending Blessings Upon the Prophet ﷺ
salawat-prophet.description: Theme: Salawat - Peace and Blessings Upon Muhammad ﷺ
suggestions: Send abundant blessings upon the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ
Remember his noble character and teachings
Ask Allah to elevate his rank
Reflect on his intercession on the Day of Judgment

faith-guidance.title: Faith, Guidance, and Spiritual Strength
faith-guidance.description: Theme: Strengthening Iman and Staying on the Straight Path
suggestions: Ask for strong, unwavering faith (iman)
Request guidance to remain on the straight path
Pray for consistency in prayers and worship
Ask for a good ending (husn al-khatimah)
Seek protection from deviation and misguidance

personal-spiritual.title: Personal and Spiritual Needs
suggestions: Make dua for strengthening your faith (iman)
Ask for consistency in prayers and worship
Request guidance on the straight path
Pray for a good ending (husn al-khatimah)

family-loved-ones.title: Family and Loved Ones
family-loved-ones.description: Theme: Blessings for Those You Love
suggestions: Make dua for your parents (living or deceased)
Pray for your spouse and children
Ask for guidance and protection for your family
Request blessings for your loved ones

family-comprehensive.title: Family, Parents, and Loved Ones
family-comprehensive.description: Theme: Comprehensive Duas for Those You Love
suggestions: Make extensive dua for your parents (living or deceased)
Pray for your spouse and children's guidance and protection
Ask for righteous offspring and blessed marriages
Request healing for sick family members
Pray for harmony, love, and unity in your family

worldly-needs.title: Worldly Needs and Livelihood
suggestions: Ask for halal sustenance and barakah in your wealth
Make dua for success in work, studies, or business
Request ease in your affairs
Remember to recite the essential dua between Rukn Yamani and Hajar Aswad (see Quick Reference section)

knowledge-deeds.title: Knowledge, Wisdom, and Righteous Deeds
knowledge-deeds.description: Theme: Seeking Beneficial Knowledge and Good Actions
suggestions: Ask for beneficial knowledge that brings you closer to Allah
Request wisdom in all your affairs
Pray for ability to perform righteous deeds consistently
Seek understanding of the Quran and Sunnah
Ask for sincerity in all your actions

health-provision.title: Health, Provision, and Worldly Needs
health-provision.description: Theme: Well-being and Sustenance in Dunya
suggestions: Ask for good health and strength for worship
Request halal provision and barakah in wealth
Pray for success in work, studies, or business
Seek ease in your worldly affairs
Ask for protection from poverty and debt

muslim-ummah.title: The Muslim Ummah
suggestions: Pray for oppressed Muslims worldwide
Ask for unity among Muslims
Make dua for those suffering in conflict zones
Request guidance for Muslim leaders and scholars

jannah-protection.title: Jannah and Protection from Jahannam
suggestions: Ask Allah for entrance into Jannah without reckoning
Seek refuge from the punishment of the grave and hellfire
Make dua to be among the righteous servants of Allah
End with abundant praise and gratitude
